flounder.parsing.json

Class JSONValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.parsing.json.JSONValue
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JSONArray, JSONLiteral, JSONNumber, JSONObject, JSONString

    public abstract class JSONValue
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a value in a JSON file.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static JSONValue parse(TokenReader tokens,
                              java.lang.String currentToken)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.text.ParseException
        Parses a value from a token source.
        Parameters:
        tokens - The tokens to parse.
        currentToken - The current token of interest.
        Returns:
        A JSONValue parsed from the tokens.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a token cannot be read.
        java.text.ParseException - If the tokens cannot be parsed into a JSONValue.
